basics.name: Eric Soto
basics.label: Junior Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a self-taught front-end developer. I primarily focus on writing clean, elegant, and efficient code. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
basics.headline: Front to end programmer.

projects.name: bitosoft
projects.summary: A demo webpage for a software developer.

work.name: Sotografy
work.summary: Sotografy is my own brand as a portrait photographer. It has an experienced team in the area of weddings and general events.

work.name: Wine to Water DR
work.summary: Wine To Water is a non-profit organization committed to supporting life and dignity for all through the power of clean water. The organization was founded by Doc Hendley in 2007.
highlights: I reorganized and systematized all the organization's expense records.
Designed and participated in the development of conference and project strategies.
Translated documents and audiovisuals from English to Spanish and Spanish to English.

awards.title: 1st Place at Photographic competition 2019.
awards.awarder: Santiago Chamber of Commerce and Production
awards.summary: Best photo at the expo Cibao with the theme ``Form yourself, become an entrepreneur and grow with us''.

certificates.name: English Immersion Program for Competitiveness
certificates.issuer: Ministry of Education of the Dominican Republic
certificates.summary: Certificate of my studies of English as a second language for the professional environment.
